title: (x) script in Cal Arts 1993 Booklet - Script 12 Pitch {Bert}
content:
Hi,

I’ve found this old catalogue of the Cal Arts school.  
I really like the script used in the text, does someone have an idea ?  
A friends of mine tell me it was maybe a font called freehand.  
I’ve found some style on the net (591, 575 etc…) but no one matches this sample.

thanks !

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [calarts.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=calarts.jpg) | 57.31 KB |
author: youri

comments.content: Sorry, I retract that. It’s probably a typewriter font.
Script 12 Pitch – I’m \*really\* sure of that.
Things you look for are always at the other end of the bookcase/alphabet/shop/etc. than were you start looking. ; )
